title: cauldron开服问题，无论什么版本都显示错误
author: sunboyy121
txt_content:
用的cauldron-1.7.10-1.1231.04.209-server.jar，libraries文件也齐全，但是怎么一直是这个，求大家帮忙解决下，谢谢了

A problem occurred running the Server launcher.java.lang.reflect.InvocationTarge
tException

ava:43)

java:12)
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/logging/log4j/Level

replies.author: sunboyy121
我才是小灰灰
replies.txt_content:
ClassNotFoundException 再看也是找不到类啊。。
我忽略了不支持中文的问题QAQ
